|elevation_footnotes =   |elevation_m =791 |elevation_ft =2595
|footnotes = }} 'Challenge' (formerly, 'Challenge Mills') is
an unincorporated community in Yuba County, California. It is located on Dry
Creek northeast of Marysville, at an elevation of 2595
feet (791 m).

A post office opened at Challenge in 1895.
categories: Populated places in Yuba County, California
Unincorporated communities in Yuba County, California
